title: President Trump Russian Interference, Van Jones Interview, Super Bowl and Great Things Will Happen
itunes:title: President Trump Russian Interference, Van Jones Interview, Super Bowl and Great Things Will Happen
description:
The Steve Harvey Morning Show discusses President Trump upcoming meeting with special counsel Robert Mueller in regards to the Russian interference, Van Jones stops by to discuss his new show, "The Van Jones Show," and Steve Harvey leaves us with closing remarks that Great Things Will Happen!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
